related_post.text: I've managed to change my GOPATH in this current project in vscode via project specific settings.So then I can import my package which exists in a subfolder.I want to do this without uploading this subpackage to github/similar I hope that's still following convention.Problem is I can't use any external package (3rd party from github for example) if I change the GOPATH.Can you use multiple GOPATHs somehow?

comments: Shamiyah asks question and Shaya provides direct SO post answer
